key_risks: Integration risks from the Umpqua merger, including cultural alignment and technology system consolidation
Economic sensitivity to regional downturns in the Pacific Northwest, particularly in real estate markets
Cybersecurity threats and potential data breaches
Regulatory compliance risks and potential penalties
controversies: Ongoing regulatory scrutiny in compliance, anti-money laundering (AML), and data security
social_issues: Reliance on third-party technology providers for core banking and cybersecurity, introducing potential vulnerabilities
governance_issues: Heightened regulatory oversight and potential compliance costs
